These third-party services are not controlled by us. We encourage our users to read the privacy policies of each website and application with which they interact. We do not endorse, screen, or approve, and are not responsible for, the privacy practices or content of such other websites or applications. Providing personal information to third-party websites or applications is at your own risk.
Supervisory Authority. If you are located in the European Economic Area, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or Brazil, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe our processing of your personal information violates applicable law.
Changes to our Privacy Policy. We may revise this Privacy Policy from time to time at our sole discretion. If there are any material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you as required by applicable law. You understand and agree that you will be deemed to have accepted the updated Privacy Policy if you continue to use our Services after the new Privacy Policy takes effect.



 	USE OF AI TOOLS AND DATA PROTECTION

Our AI Tools utilize advanced generative pre-trained transformer language models, (the “Language Models”), to deliver high-quality, human-like text generation based on user prompts and messages. This section outlines how we safeguard your personal data when you interact with our AI Tools:
Data Collection and Use:


 	When you use our tools that use AI functionality (the “AI Tools”), we collect and process the text you input (the “user input”) to generate responses.
 	The language models use this User Input alongside the extensive datasets they were trained on to create relevant and accurate responses.
 	We do not use user input to retrain or improve the language models, nor do we share this data with third parties for such purposes.

Data Storage and Security:


 	User Input is temporarily stored on secure servers to facilitate the processing and delivery of responses. We implement industry-standard encryption protocols to protect this data from unauthorized access and breaches.
 	Stored data is periodically reviewed and securely deleted in accordance with our data retention policy, ensuring that personal data is not kept longer than necessary.

Data Anonymization:


 	We anonymize user input to the greatest extent possible. Personal identifiers such as names, addresses, and other specific details are stripped from the data before processing by the language models.
 	Any identifiable information inadvertently collected through user input is promptly anonymized or deleted.

User Control and Consent:


 	Users have control over the data they provide to our AI Tools. We encourage you to avoid sharing sensitive personal information unless absolutely necessary for the intended interaction.
 	By using our AI Tools, you consent to the processing of your user input as described in this privacy policy clause. You may withdraw consent at any time by ceasing use of the AI Tools and requesting the deletion of any stored data.

Third-Party Access:


 	We do not share user input with third-party entities for marketing, advertising, or other purposes unrelated to the operation and improvement of our AI Tools.
 	In exceptional circumstances where disclosure is required by law, we ensure that such requests are handled with the utmost care and in compliance with legal standards.

User Rights:


 	You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data stored by us. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@goodtime.io
 	We are committed to responding to your requests promptly and transparently, ensuring that your data privacy rights are respected.



 	CONTACT US

If you have any questions about our privacy practices or this Privacy Policy, or to exercise your rights as detailed in this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Data Protection Officer
440 North Barranca Avenue #4198
Covina, CA 91723
privacy@goodtime.io
excerpt: You deserve to know how your data is managed. So here’s the fine print in our privacy policy.
